params._fee: The fee denominated in hundredths of a bip
params._tokenA: The contract address of either token0 or token1
params._tokenB: The contract address of the other token

params._fee: The fee denominated in hundredths of a bip
params._tokenA: The contract address of either token0 or token1
params._tokenB: The contract address of the other token

params._dataReceiver: The address of the new allowed dataReceiver

params._initialCardinality: The initial size of the observations memory storage for newly deployed pools

params._pendingGovernor: Address of the proposed new governor

initialCardinality.return: The initial size of the observations memory storage for newly deployed pools

returns._0: The initial size of the observations memory storage for newly deployed pools

returns.cardinality: The size of the observations memory storage
returns.factory: The address of the deployer factory
returns.poolNonce: The initial nonce of the pool data
returns.poolSalt: The id of both the oracle and the pool

OnlyGovernor().notice: Throws if a non-governor user tries to call a OnlyGovernor function

OnlyPendingGovernor().notice: Throws if a non-pending-governor user tries to call a OnlyPendingGovernor function

ZeroAddress().notice: Throws if a variable is assigned to the zero address

PendingGovernorAccepted(address).notice: Emitted when a new governor is set

PendingGovernorSet(address,address).notice: Emitted when a new pending governor is set

acceptPendingGovernor().notice: Allows a proposed governor to accept the governance

setDataReceiver(address).notice: Allows governor to set a new allowed dataReceiver

setInitialCardinality(uint16).notice: Allows governor to set a new initial cardinality for new oracles

setPendingGovernor(address).notice: Allows a governor to propose a new governor
